name: places/ChIJzVni4_NZwokRX5SFJvDIUH8
formattedAddress: 53 E 66th St, New York, NY 10065, USA
adrFormatAddress: 53 E 66th St, New York, NY 10065, USA

originalText.text: Dr. Salm is an excellent dentist. He is very informative and explains the type of work he is performing and what is needed to resolve any dental issues. We have been going to him for over 6 years and he provides high quality work, from dental cleanings to taking x-rays, to fillings/crowns and more. Ethel, the office manager, responds very quickly and is a pleasure to communicate with. She is extremely helpful in scheduling appointments, and is super helpful in submitting dental claims. She goes the extra mile to help in any way she can. All in all, Adam and Ethel are two of the best professionals you will ever encounter. Highly recommend Dr. Salm and his office staff!

text.text: Dr. Salm is an excellent dentist. He is very informative and explains the type of work he is performing and what is needed to resolve any dental issues. originalText.text: Dr. Salm is by far, one of the best dentists I’ve ever been to. He always makes me feel comfortable and recommends the best products and habits for my sensitive teeth. I’ve been seeing him for over a year now and have never had a bad experience. The office manager, Ethel, makes booking appointments and payments a breeze. Ethel and Dr. Salm have always been kind, respectful, and accommodating towards me. I’d recommend Dr. Salm to all my friends and family because I know they’d be in the best hands. Overall, everyone in that office treats you like family, the way it should be.

text.text: Dr. Salm is by far, one of the best dentists I’ve ever been to. He always makes me feel comfortable and recommends the best products and habits for my sensitive teeth. originalText.text: After years of searching and trying different dentists, I can confidently say I’ve found my dental office with Salm Dental. Dr. Salm makes me feel super comfortable (a rarity for me at the dentist) and has oftentimes caught or recommended things other dentists never did — for instance, recommending I switch to an electric toothbrush so that I’m softer on my gums. He’s super friendly and really cares about his work and his patients and it shows! Ethel, the Office Manager, is also amazing and SO thorough. Elsewhere I’ve been left in the dark regarding costs, what insurance will cover, etc. - but Ethel does all of the due diligence and informs you of each cost every step of the way. It’s really such a relief! Highly, highly recommend Salm Dental - and believe it or not, I’m actually looking forward to my next cleaning.

originalText.text: I've seen Dr. Salm for years and always recommend him to friends looking for a great dentist. Warm and professional, he always takes time to explain X-rays and procedures. I really like that he does cleanings himself, instead of the parade of different hygienists I encountered in other practices I've gone to in the city. His office staff, especially Ethel, are very helpful and friendly. Highly recommend!

His office staff, especially Ethel, are very helpful and friendly. Highly recommend!

originalText.text: I've been going to Dr. Salm for about 5 years now and he is by far the best dentist I have had. He's easy to talk to, has friendly staff and a clean office. He is always very thorough with dental exams and I actually don't mind having to go to the dentist (for once!). I would highly recommend Dr. Salm.
